articles.author: Harry Howard
articles.title: 'Fraggle Rock was one of the most DANGEROUS jobs I ever had', says lighthouse keeper Simon O'Brien - Daily Mail
articles.description: Fraggle Rock star Simon O'Brien, who played BJ the lighthouse keeper in Fraggle Rock's final season in 1987, has revealed the role was 'one of the most dangerous jobs' he has ever had.
articles.content:
Along with the Doozers, the Gorgs and the Silly Creatures of Outer Space, the Fraggles of Fraggle Rock last appeared on TV screens in 1987.
